Account Deletion & Management Policy

At Raconli Group, we prioritize the security and integrity of user information. To maintain full administrative control and protect user data, account deletion or blocking can only be performed by an authorized administrator from the Admin Dashboard.

Users do not have the ability to delete their own accounts from within the mobile app. If you wish to request deletion or deactivation of your account, please contact our support team or your assigned administrator.

Administrators are able to perform the following actions from the dashboard:

  • Permanently delete a user account upon formal request.
  • Temporarily block or deactivate a user account for security or policy reasons.
